Ce jeu est très plaisant dans l'idée mais sincèrement le matchmaking est naz et l'équilibrage est pitoyable en tout cas quand on joue Killer... Les 5 dernières parties ont été impossibles à gagner avec des gens qui s'amusaient littéralement avec le killer (moi) et m'empêchaient de tout faire en restant à côté de moi, démontant les crochets, m'éblouissants et attendant la fin du chrono de partie pour me troll (les 5 parties)... bref no-game je ne comprend même pas en quoi c'est plaisant pour eux.... L'équilibrage est clairement à revoir. J'ai fait 10 parties... 5 m'ont permises de monter en level incroyablement vite et ensuite ... bah c'était les survivants qui me cherchaient pour s'amuser. Dommage que ce soit un jeu de troll car l'idée est vraiment cool.

To be quite honest? It's a hit and miss whether you'll enjoy the game and it's entirely dependent on what kind of people you get matched with. If you're survivor, group up with friends. If you're killer, good luck? 

The game itself is very much alive and gets regular updates with events and new content (chapters that include a new survivor and killer and often a new map). The concept is solid and is fun when people make it fun.

Es war früher eins meiner Lieblings Spiele aber wenn jeder Mörder einen schon fast jede Runde zu Tode tunnelt und face campt, hat man auch keinen Bock mehr dieses Spiel jemals wieder weiter zu spielen, man hat ja als Überlebender keine richtige Chance das man das Spiel noch gewinnen kann und außerdem muss man sich "eigentlich" Überlebende kaufen, damit man bessere Chancen im Game hat. Ich finde wenn sich das Game nicht verbessert, ist es einfach raus geschmissenes Geld.

dead by daylight made me realize i hate women

At first, this game is super fresh and thrilling as all survival horror games are. It's great for a good scare and is super fun getting scared with friends.

Once you get deeper into the game (maybe a few hundred hours), the game stops being scary. You start to learn how the maps are laid out, how killers work, etc. It becomes more competitive. The fun starts to come from the chases and strategizing on how to get a 4 escape/kill. There's a lot of fun in trying to outplay your opponent that I feel is similar to other PVP games like Smash Bros (which I also love).

However, there's a lot of cheesy stuff in the game which can make it feel unfair. There are perks/add-ons/items which win the game just because they're super strong. Some people will play as scummy as possible if it means they'll win. Endgame chat can get super toxic when people feel butthurt. I feel this is the main source of frustration for the DBD community. It can help if you play with friends (you can laugh off the NOED together), but sometimes it's worth taking a break from the game if you get hit with cheese/toxicity for a while.

Despite all of that, I still love this game. I try to keep a positive outlook and end each game with a "GG". From my perspective, it looks like the devs are trying their best to address the issues with the game and make it better for the future. Here's to hoping they succeed and help move the game into a better state.

It's almost incredible that this game is still alive after 6 years of adding virtually nothing of import to it.  

They add new outfits for killers and survivors to look mildly different as they both do the same objectives over and over again.  

Sometimes there's events, where they will add festive decorations to hooks and generators to visually appeal to killers and survivors as they do the same objectives over and over again.

They have a rank system, where killers and survivors can rank up and gain mediocre gifts for doing the same objectives over and over again.

Sometimes, if you're lucky, you get stuck in a game with a hacker that game moderators seem too incompetent to ever punish.  I only say lucky because it means you most likely won't get stuck having to do the same objectives over and over again and the game will end rather quickly.

If you're a new player, you'll have fun for about a week.  If you enjoy senseless repetition, maybe longer.  If you're a returning player, don't bother; it's still the same exact game you abandoned whenever you left the first time.

Strongly recommend. There is a learning curve. It took me about a month and watching several tutorials before I figured out what to do. Now I've been a consistent Red Rank for the past 3 seasons. Sometimes the hitboxes are funny but most times it is ping issues not game mechanic parts. The only downside is that people will play very toxic occasionally by face-camping or tunneling. Other than that though, I strongly recommend

A game that couldve been great if it was actually fun to play. Sure theres some fun to be had at the beginning as you and fellow newbie players get your bearings. But as you play more and more and learn just how much grind there is and just how toxic the community it gets harder and harder to have fun. I've played under 300 hours and already playing is miserable 90% of the time. Devs would rather make more cosmetics to sell than address issues, and playerbase would rather actively make sure their opponent(s) are having a bad time than just win. Most play sessions now end after one game followed by asking myself "Why am I playing this? I'm not having fun." Then closing and playing something else. Maybe one day I'll update this, but right now go buy evil dead or VHS or something of you're craving the asymmetrical horror. This game and its devs at the moment doesnt deserve your time or money.

군단 유저인데 스킬을 지속하는 아이템 딸랑 두개로 플레이를 하라는 건가요? 생존자 이동속도 사기입니다. 이동속도가 빠르고 창이나 판자를 이용하면 절대 못 잡더라구요. 아까 마한 고카페인 아이템 이 한개 아니면 군단 살인마는 진짜 하지 마세요. 군단유저로서 충고하는거에요. 차라리 군단이 판자넘기나 창틀 넘기를 더 빠르게 했다면 그나마 좋을까요? 아뇨 전혀요 아까 말했지만 생존자 이동속도 아이템이 문제에요. 그것도 4명이라면 살인마 농락 하면서 플레이 하는데 그 살인마도 엄연히 유저입니다. 고카페인 아이템이나 겨우아이템 능력부여가 4%라도 제대로 플레이를 할 수 가 없을 때가 많아요. 만약 생존자들이 이동속도 스틸을 가지고 살인마 유저를 농락할경우 느끼는 극심한 스트레스가 생겨요. 군단 캐릭터 플레이해서 그런 것도 있지만 아무리 노력해도 고카페인 아이템이 아니라면 생존자 한명이라도 제대로 못 잡는 현실이라는거죠. 

The speed of movement of survivors is a real scam. Survivors can never catch them if they use window frames or boards to move quickly and run away. If you don't have one caffeine item, don't. I'm advising you as a corps user, but as I said before, speed items for survivors are the problem. The deliberate bullying of survivors is psychological distress to the killer, and the killer is clearly a user. Although high caffeine items are very good, otherwise corps killer users are under extreme stress. No matter how high a caffeine item is, the character of the corps cannot catch survivors. This is a very serious problem.
